example.query: Impact of AI on recruiting jobs
example.finding_1: LinkedIn report: AI will augment recruiters, not replace them
example.finding_2: Forbes article: 30% of recruiting jobs at risk from AI automation
example.synthesis:
Views are mixed:
- **Optimistic view:** AI will augment recruiters, handling admin work while humans focus on relationship-building (LinkedIn report)
- **Cautious view:** 30% of recruiting jobs may be automated, particularly high-volume screening roles (Forbes)
- **My take:** Reality likely in between - AI will change recruiting significantly, eliminate some roles, transform others, create new ones. Recruiters who adopt AI will have advantage.
example.confidence: Medium - conflicting expert opinions, outcome depends on factors (adoption rate, regulation, etc.)

steps: If consensus, return answer with source
If conflict, dig deeper or note uncertainty
